# List the images for an in-app event | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ List the images for an in-app event ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventScreenshots-_id_)

-  List the images for an in-app event 

Web Service Endpoint# List the images for an in-app event

App Store Connect API 1.7+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventScreenshots-_id_#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appEventScreenshots/{id}
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventScreenshots-_id_#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventScreenshots-_id_#query-parameters)

`fields[appEventScreenshots]``[string]`

 Possible Values: `fileSize, fileName, imageAsset, assetToken, uploadOperations, assetDeliveryState, appEventAssetType, appEventLocalization``include``[string]`

 Value: `appEventLocalization`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventScreenshots-_id_#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppEventScreenshotResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appeventscreenshotresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`` Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventScreenshots-_id_#see-also)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventScreenshots-_id_#Endpoints)

[`PATCH /v1/appEventScreenshots/{id}`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-appeventscreenshots-_id_)[`POST /v1/appEventScreenshots`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-appeventscreenshots)[`Delete an App Event Screenshot`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-appeventscreenshots-_id_)Delete a specific screenshot from an in-app event.
